DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this case control study is to explore the possible association between periodontal destruction and serum anti-CCP antibodies in RA patients and healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Associations Between Periodontitis and Autoimmune Antibodies in Rheumatoid Arthritis Disease
DOC.detailed_description: In patients with RA, the anti-CCP antibody titer seems positively correlated to their periodontal destruction and disease activity in comparison with healthy subjects.
